last_episode_to_air.name: Gross Player
last_episode_to_air.overview: Movie producer Peter Dragon accidentally picks up a prostitute at his premiere and decides to keep her on for more than just the show. Features Keanu Reeves.

name: Action
overview: Follow the life of Peter Dragon, an egotistic Hollywood movie producer who has built his career on the three pillars of sleazy show business - prostitution, nepotism and dishonesty.

seasons.name: Action
seasons.overview: Peter Dragon's most recent, massively expensive, movie bombed and he needs a hit. Along the way he has to raise finance from some very dubious characters, deal with a vindictive studio chief, hire a cast and crew,  and maintain his public image.

episodes.name: Gross Player
episodes.overview: Movie producer Peter Dragon accidentally picks up a prostitute at his premiere and decides to keep her on for more than just the show. Features Keanu Reeves.

episodes.name: Re-Enter the Dragon
episodes.overview: Guest star Salma Hayek accuses Peter of couch-casting, but his real humiliation comes at the box office with the release of his movie.

episodes.name: Blood Money
episodes.overview: Peter will go to any length to raise $50 million for his new project, but it's Wendy who spurs things along with her "talents" to motivate the writer.

episodes.name: Blowhard
episodes.overview: Past girlfriend Sandra Bullock jumps Peter when she discovers he has taped their lovemaking sessions and released them on video.

episodes.name: Mr. Dragon Goes to Washington
episodes.overview: Adam's new agent works up some "heat" while Peter flops testifying before Congress, forcing him to get a total PR makeover. Features David Hasselhoff.

episodes.name: Twelfth Step to Hell
episodes.overview: "Party of Five" star Scott Wolf auditions for Peter's new movie, but comes up short - while Peter feels his mortality in a religious pitch meeting.

episodes.name: Dragon's Blood
episodes.overview: Peter's young directors go to summer camp instead of helming his movie, while Peter almost trades his daughter to an Arabian king.

episodes.name: Love Sucks
episodes.overview: Stuart is a player when he signs a supermodel to co-star in the movie - but loses big time when his new heavy shows up 50 pounds overweight.

episodes.name: Strong Sexual Content
episodes.overview: A nasty rumor about Peter, a frog, and one of his body parts make the rounds in Tinseltown, while Wendy makes the most of Peter's new assistant.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Action!
episodes.overview: Peter has a heart attack when the first day of shooting includes a star who wants a bigger crotch, a $25,000 diversity bird and a wacko director.

episodes.name: Dead Man Floating
episodes.overview: Peter miraculously recovers from his heart attack in time to audition the "boob" scene, while his leading man Holden manages to kill the director.

episodes.name: One Easy Piece
episodes.overview: Peter's sexy new star decides she's got it - but isn't going to show it - while Stuart and Adam are treated to a game of Hollywood Hopscotch.

episodes.name: The Last Ride of the Elephant Princess
episodes.overview: Surprise! Peter finds out the sloppy, obnoxious Rothstein brothers own the script to his movie, so he and Wendy put the screws to them to get it back.

1.name: Action
1.overview: Peter Dragon's most recent, massively expensive, movie bombed and he needs a hit. Along the way he has to raise finance from some very dubious characters, deal with a vindictive studio chief, hire a cast and crew,  and maintain his public image.
